UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile in the VozGenius application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user, matching the Firebase Auth UID.

whatsappName.description: The user's display name for WhatsApp.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user account was created.

credits.description: The number of credits the user has available.

RecordingOrder.title: Recording Order
RecordingOrder.description: Represents a single recording order made by a user.

userId.description: The UID of the user who created the order.

title.description: The user-defined title for the recording.

recordingStyle.description: The style of the recording (e.g., Abertura, Comercial).

voiceActorId.description: The ID of the chosen voice actor.

voiceActorName.description: The name of the chosen voice actor (denormalized).

narrationStyle.description: The style of narration (e.g., Padrão, Impacto).

script.description: The full text script to be recorded.

usedCredits.description: The number of credits spent on this order.

status.description: The current status of the order.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the order was created.

finalAudioUrl.description: URL to the final, delivered audio file.

Voice.title: Voice
Voice.description: Represents a voice actor or an AI voice available in the marketplace.

name.description: The display name of the voice actor or AI.

avatarUrl.description: URL for the voice's avatar image.

tags.description: Descriptive tags for the voice style (e.g., 'impacto', 'jovem').

demoUrl.description: URL to the audio demo file.

status.description: Availability status of the voice actor.

isStatic.description: Flag to identify if the voice is from the static list or from the database.

definition.description: Stores user profile data. The document ID must match the user's Firebase Auth UID.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user, from Firebase Authentication.

params.name: orderId
params.description: The unique identifier for the order.

definition.description: Stores all available voices, both human and AI.

params.name: voiceId
params.description: The unique identifier for the voice.
